Package Game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Game.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Static class representing playable character

    • dealDamage

      public static void dealDamage​(double damage)
      Subtracts the specified amount from player's health. If the health is less or equal to 0 player loses.
      Parameters:
      damage - damage dealt to player.

    • switchWeapon

      public static void switchWeapon()
      Switches the currently equipped weapon for the next in sequence or the first one if it was the last. Hides the previous weapon and draws the next, updates the player's HUD.

    • dealHorror

      public static void dealHorror​(double horror)
      Subtracts the specified amount from player's sanity. If the sanity is less or equal to 0 player loses.
      Parameters:
      horror - horror dealt to player.

    • healDamage

      public static void healDamage​(double amount)
      Adds the specified amount to player's health. Prevents player from having more health the maximum health specified.
      Parameters:
      amount - amount healed.

    • heallHorror

      public static void heallHorror​(double amount)
      Adds the specified amount to player's sanity. Prevents player from having more sanity the maximum sanity specified.
      Parameters:
      amount - amount restored.

    • getAngle

      public static double getAngle()
      Returns:
      the angle of player's rotation along y axis.

    • getX

      public static double getX()
      Returns:
      x coordinate in scene.

      public static double getY()
      Returns:
      y coordinate in scene.

      public static double getZ()
      Returns:
      z coordinate in scene.

    • use

      public static void use()
      Checks whether player is in vicinity of item which can be picked up.

    • checkPlayerCollision

      public static boolean checkPlayerCollision()
      Returns:
      whether player is colliding with wall.

    • checkPlayerCollision

      public static boolean checkPlayerCollision​(javafx.geometry.Bounds hitBox)
      Parameters:
      hitBox - entities hitBox to be considered in collision.
      Returns:
      whether player has collided with hitBox specified.
